Mike Pence   Steve Cohen , D-Tennessee, used a late night House floor speech Tuesday to hit Republicans for what he called "lies""  about a government takeover of the health care system, and evoked Nazi propagandist Joseph Goebbels.  They say it's a government takeover of health care, a big lie, just like Goebbels. You say it enough, you repeat the lie, you repeat the lie, you repeat the lie and eventually people believe it,  he said.  Steve Cohen , who is Jewish, went on to compare that "lie""  to the term "blood libel,""  a phrase that historically was used to falsely accuse Jews of killing Christian children.
